text: if you're craving for some afternoon

recipes for this recipe you're going to

in a large microwaveable bowl mix
together the rice flour and the tapioca
starch and then we also soaked the dry
streams in hot water for about 15
minutes to soften mix together 1 and 1/4

milk then add about a tablespoon of
sugar about half a teaspoon of salt and
also about a tablespoon of vegetable oil
now give it a good stir now make a hole
in the middle of the flour and the
starch and gently pouring the liquid
stir until the starch and the flour is
completely dissolved and then we're
going to let the batter sit for about
half an hour to reduce the strong flour
smell after letting the batter rest for
about half an hour now I give it a good
stir again and then we're going to put
this into a microwave of at 700 watts
for about 4 to 5 minutes just take out

half minutes after one and a half
minutes you see that the starch start

you get a very thick paste like this

add about a tablespoon or two of
